about.title: About MyLearnia
about.subtitle: Empowering learners worldwide
about.missionText: To provide accessible, high-quality education to learners of all ages and backgrounds through personalized mentoring.
about.visionText: A world where everyone has access to quality education and the opportunity to reach their full potential.
about.excellenceText: We strive for the highest quality in everything we do
about.accessibilityText: Education should be available to everyone
about.innovationText: We continuously improve our platform and methods
